overview: After more than two decades of public radio, Youssef is on his way to retirement. His wife, Amal, is seeking refuge after a mastectomy. Their youngest daughter (Aziza), who lives completely separate from the atmosphere and values ​​of her family, inherited her father's passion for alcohol. The younger brother (Amin) tries to bring his family's diaspora back together. But suddenly, Youssef is violently suspended and banned from broadcasting the last episodes of "Tunis by Night". Impressed and silent, Joseph takes refuge in the adjacent St. George bar to empty his mind as he swallows wine bottles. On the same night, Aziza cuts her arteries after a series of troubles, and Youssef fled his family to disappear in a city he did not know.
title: تونس بالليل
